results.title: Amaurosis fugax caused by heritable thrombophilia-hypofibrinolysis in cases without carotid atherosclerosis: thromboprophylaxis prevents subsequent transient monocular partial blindness.
results.text_hl: Our hypothesis was that case-specific thromboprophylaxis would prevent subsequent @<m>DISEASE_Amaurosis_Fugax</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020757 @@@amaurosis fugax@@@ episodes.

citations.NLM: Glueck CJ, Golnik K, Ping Wang. Amaurosis fugax caused by heritable thrombophilia-hypofibrinolysis in cases without carotid atherosclerosis: thromboprophylaxis prevents subsequent transient monocular partial blindness. Clin Appl Thromb Hemost. 2007 Apr;13(2):124-9. PMID: 17456620

results.title: Metformin and sitAgliptin in patients with impAired glucose tolerance and a recent TIA or minor ischemic Stroke (MAAS): study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: We expect that 50 % of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ will experience side effects during follow-up.

citations.NLM: Osei E, Fonville S, Zandbergen AA, Brouwers PJ, Mulder LJ, Lingsma HF, Dippel DW, Koudstaal PJ, den Hertog HM. Metformin and sitAgliptin in patients with impAired glucose tolerance and a recent TIA or minor ischemic Stroke (MAAS): study protocol for a randomized controlled trial Trials. 2015 Aug 5;16():332. PMID: 26242578
